patterns: What should I use you for
What are you supposed to do?

responses: I can try to help you with issues related to your computer or peripherals, or you can leave a support request if you like.
Happy to help! Anything else I can do for you?

patterns: What products do you have for sale?

responses: We sell computers and their peripherals. Feel free to look at our product page! I can also recommend products based on price.

responses: Delivery takes approximately 4-10 days
